summary: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.
cast: John Cleese|Sean Connery|Shelley Duvall|Katherine Helmond|Ian Holm|Michael Palin|Ralph Richardson|Peter Vaughan|David Warner|David Rappaport|Kenny Baker|Malcolm Dixon|Mike Edmonds|Jack Purvis|Tiny Ross|Craig Warnock|David Daker|Sheila Fearn|Jim Broadbent|John Young|Myrtle Devenish|Brian Bowes|Leon Lissek|Terence Bayler|Preston Lockwood|Charles McKeown|David Leland|John Hughman|Derrick O'Connor|Neil McCarthy|Declan Mulholland|Peter Jonfield|Derek Deadman|Jerold Wells|Roger Frost|Martin Carroll|Marcus Powell|Winston Dennis|Del Baker|Juliette James|Ian Muir|Mark Holmes|Andrew MacLachlan|Chris Grant|Tony Jay|Edwin Finn|Ray Cooper|Fred Wood
